nodes.text: A unnamed Onderon rebel lived on Onderon during the Clone Wars but when Sanjay Rash affiliated with the Confederacy of Independent Systems, this individual joined the Onderon rebels to recapture the planet. The rebels called the Jedi for help, who dispatched to help them in training. When the Jedi arrived, the individual spotted the them and contacted Steela. Following their dropoff into Onderon's wilderness, the group meets one of the rebel leaders, Steela Gerrera, and are taken to the rebel base.
This Onderonian rebel scout was voiced by Matthew Wood.
